heading: ʻOku tauhi ʻe he kau Nīfaí ʻa e fono ʻa Mōsesé, ʻo nau ʻamanaki atu ki he hāʻele mai ʻa Kalaisí, pea nau tuʻumālie ʻi he fonuá—ʻOku tokolahi ʻa e kau palōfita ʻoku nau ngāue ke nofo maʻu ʻa e kakaí ʻi he hala ʻo e moʻoní. Taʻu 399–361 K.M. nai.

verses.txt: KO ʻeni vakai, ko au, Seilomi, ʻoku ou tohi ha ngaahi lea siʻi ʻo fakatatau ki he fekau ʻa ʻeku tamai, ko ʻĪnosí, koeʻuhi ke lava ʻo tauhi homau tohi hohokó.

Pea ko e meʻa ʻi he siʻisiʻi ʻa e ngaahi peleti ko ʻení, pea koeʻuhi ʻoku tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻi he ʻuhinga ke ʻaonga ki homau kāinga ko e kau Leimaná, ko ia, ʻoku ʻaonga ai ke u tohi ha meʻa siʻi pē; ka ʻe ʻikai te u tohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau ki heʻeku kikité, pe ko ʻeku ngaahi fakahaá. He ko e hā mo ha toe meʻa te u lava ʻo tohi ʻo lahi ange ʻi he meʻa kuo tohi ʻe heʻeku ngaahi tamaí? He ʻikai koā kuo nau fakahā ʻa e palani ʻo e fakamoʻuí? ʻOku ou pehē kiate kimoutolu: ʻIo; pea ʻoku feʻunga ʻeni kiate au.

Vakai, ʻoku ʻaonga ke fai ha ngāue lahi ʻi he kakaí ni, koeʻuhi ko e fefeka ʻo honau lotó, mo e tuli ʻa honau telingá, mo e fakapoʻuli ʻo honau ʻatamaí, mo e kekeva ʻo honau kiá; ka neongo iá, ʻoku kei fuʻu ʻaloʻofa lahi kiate kinautolu ʻa e ʻOtuá, pea kuo teʻeki ai ke ne tafiʻi ʻa kinautolu mei he funga ʻo e fonuá.

Pea ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e tokolahi ʻiate kimautolu kuo maʻu ha ngaahi fakahā lahi, he ʻoku ʻikai ke nau kia-kekeva kotoa pē. Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku ʻikai kia-kekeva ka ʻoku nau maʻu ʻa e tuí, ʻoku nau feohi vāofi mo e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku fakahā mai ki he fānau ʻa e tangatá, ʻo fakatatau ki heʻenau tuí.

Pea ko ʻeni, vakai, kuo ʻosi atu ʻa e taʻu ʻe uangeau, pea kuo fakaʻau ʻo mālohi ʻa e kau Nīfaí ʻi he fonuá. Naʻa nau feinga ke tauhi ʻa e fono ʻa Mōsesé mo e ʻaho sāpaté ke toputapu ki he ʻEikí. Pea naʻe ʻikai te nau lea kapekape; pe te nau lea taukae ki he ʻEikí. Pea naʻe fuʻu fefeka ʻaupito ʻa e ngaahi lao ʻo e fonuá.

Pea naʻa nau mafola ʻi he konga lahi ʻo e funga ʻo e fonuá, pea pehē mo e kau Leimaná. Pea naʻa nau fuʻu tokolahi ange ʻiate kinautolu naʻe ʻo e kau Nīfaí; pea naʻa nau manako ʻi he fakapoó pea naʻa nau inu ʻa e toto ʻo e fanga manú.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻa nau haʻu tuʻo lahi ke tau mo kimautolu, ko e kau Nīfaí. Ka ko homau ngaahi tuʻí mo homau kau takimuʻá ko e kau tangata ivi lahi ʻi he tui ki he ʻEikí; pea naʻa nau akoʻi ki he kakaí ʻa e ngaahi hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEikí; ko ia, naʻa mau matuʻuaki ʻa e kau Leimaná ʻo tekeʻi ʻa kinautolu mei homau ngaahi fonuá, ʻo mau kamata ke langa kolotau ʻi homau ngaahi koló, pe ko ha ngaahi potu pē ʻi homau tofiʻá.

Pea naʻa mau fakatokolahi ʻo fuʻu tokolahi ʻaupito, pea mafola atu ʻi he funga ʻo e fonuá, ʻo mau fakaʻau ʻo fuʻu koloaʻia ʻi he koula, mo e siliva, mo e ngaahi meʻa mahuʻinga, mo e ngaahi ngāue fakatufunga lelei ʻaupito ʻo e ʻakau, pea ʻi he ngaahi langa fale, mo e ngaahi meʻa ngāue ukamea, pea mo e ukamea foki mo e kopa, mo e palasa mo e sitila, ʻo mau ngaohi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ngāue fakatufunga kehekehe ʻo e faʻahinga kotoa pē ke ngoueʻi ʻaki ʻa e kelekelé, pea mo e ngaahi mahafu tau—ʻio, ʻa e ngahau ʻoku mata māsila, mo e hōfangahau, mo e ngahau iiki, mo e tao, pea mo e ngaahi teuteu kotoa pē ki he tau.

Pea ʻi heʻemau teuteu pehē ke fetaulaki mo e kau Leimaná, naʻe ʻikai te nau lava ai ha meʻa kiate kimautolu. Ka naʻe fakamoʻoniʻi hono moʻoni ʻo e folofola ʻa e ʻEikí ʻa ia naʻá ne folofola ʻaki ki heʻemau ngaahi tamaí, ʻo pehē: Kapau te mou tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú te mou tuʻumālie ʻi he fonuá.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē naʻe valokiʻi ʻe he kau palōfita ʻa e ʻEikí ʻa e kakai ʻo Nīfaí, ʻo fakatatau ki he folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá, he kapau ʻe ʻikai te nau tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekaú, ʻo nau tō ki he maumau-fonó, ʻe fakaʻauha ʻa kinautolu mei he funga ʻo e fonuá.

Ko ia, naʻe ngāue faivelenga ʻa e kau palōfitá, mo e kau taulaʻeikí, mo e kau akonakí, ʻo nau naʻinaʻi ki he kakaí ʻi he faʻa kātaki fuoloa ke nau ngāue faivelenga; pea nau akonaki ʻaki ʻa e fono ʻa Mōsesé, mo hono ʻuhinga naʻe fokotuʻu ai iá; ʻo fakalotoʻi ʻa kinautolu ke ʻamanaki atu ki he Mīsaiá, pea tui kiate ia ʻe hāʻele mai ʻo hangē kuó ne ʻosi hāʻele mai. Pea ko e anga ʻeni ʻo ʻenau akoʻi ʻa kinautolú.

Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi heʻenau fai peheé naʻa nau taʻofi ʻa hono fakaʻauha ʻo kinautolu mei he funga ʻo e fonuá; he naʻa nau huhuhuhuʻi ke mamahi honau lotó ʻaki ʻa e folofolá, mo ueʻi hake maʻu pē ʻa kinautolu ke nau fakatomala.
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē kuo ʻosi atu ʻa e taʻu ʻe uangeau mā tolungofulu mā valu—ʻi he founga ʻo e ngaahi tau, mo e ngaahi fakakikihi, mo e ngaahi maveuveu, ʻi ha konga lahi ʻo e taimi ko iá.

Pea ko au, Seilomi, ʻoku ʻikai te u tohi mo ha toe meʻa lahi ange, he ʻoku siʻi ʻa e ngaahi peletí. Kae vakai, ʻe hoku kāinga, te mou lava ʻo vakai ʻi he ngaahi peleti kehe ʻa Nīfaí; he vakai, kuo tohi ai ʻa e ngaahi lekooti ʻo ʻemau ngaahi taú, ʻo hangē ko e ngaahi meʻa naʻe tohi ʻe he ngaahi tuʻí, pe ko e ngaahi meʻa naʻa nau fekau ke tohí.
Pea ʻoku ou tuku ʻa e ngaahi peletí ni ki he nima ʻo hoku foha ko ʻAmenaí, koeʻuhi ke tauhi ia ʻo fakatatau ki he ngaahi fekau kuo fai kiate au ʻe heʻeku ngaahi tamaí.
